scripts.build: (cd client && npm install && npm run build) && npm run copy-to-root
scripts.deploy:github: cd client && VITE_BASE_PATH='/bettergpt/' npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf assets index.html 404.html *.png *.svg 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r client/dist/* . && cp client/dist/index.html ./404.html && echo '✓ GitHub Pages files ready'
scripts.copy-to-root: rm -rf assets index.html 404.html *.png *.svg 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r client/dist/* . && cp client/dist/404.html ./404.html 2>/dev/null || cp client/dist/index.html ./404.html && ls -la assets/ && echo '✓ Files copied to root'
